bookTitle: The Good, the Bad, and the Undead
Plot: Rachel Morgan, sexy witch, independent bounty hunter, prowls the downtown Cincinnati for criminal creatures of the night. She can handle leather-clad vamps and a cunning demon or two. But a serial killer who feeds on the experts in the most dangerous kind of black magic is an ancient, implacable evil that threatens her very soul.
Characters: Rachel Morgan, Ivy Tamwood, Jenks, Trent Kalamack, Algaliarept, Kisten Felps, Nick Sparagmos, Piscary, Detective Glenn, Jonathan, Quen, Captain Edden
